formattedAddress: 13 St Marks Pl, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 13 St Marks Pl, New York, NY 10003, USA

editorialSummary.text: Trendy outpost mixing Asian elements like green tea & yuzu into cookies, cakes & boba drinks.

originalText.text: This is the perfect place for a sweet treat after a big meal in a any of the other restaurants nearby. There was a pretty decent wait time to get in, however you didn't have to wait outside as you could join the list online and they'd notify you when your table was ready, there is also a really good heater there if you decide to wait outside and it worked really well during a really cold day in January. If you can get past the tight seating, this place has a pretty nice atmosphere, the staff are very polite and helpful if you want to know anything about the food they have on offer. We tried the golden toast and the milky puff (this was a hard decision for me as my raging sweet tooth wanted to try everything), the price was pretty high for a dessert spot, however, the quality and the taste of the food made up for it so it didn't hurt my frugal soul as much as it could've. By the end your sweet cravings will definitely be satiated and you will be happily full so I 100% recommend visiting at least once.

originalText.text: The Spot Dessert Bar has been on my list for awhile now! The desserts are picture perfect and everything is priced the same at $14.45. Staff was really helpful in describing the flavor profile of everything. We ordered the Harvest, Milky Puff and Golden Toast. I enjoyed all of them but that’s my rank for them. None of the desserts were overly sweet and the staff really delivers beautiful desserts. I loved the Harvest because it reminded me for a light cookies and creme cheesecake and the pot was so cute! Your desserts come pretty quickly like 10 minutes or less and they are prepared fresh to order.

text.text: The Spot Dessert Bar has been on my list for awhile now! The desserts are picture perfect and everything is priced the same at $14.45. originalText.text: It's my favorite dessert place in NYC! This was my second time eating here, the first time since 2018. Glad to see that the pandemic didn't end this business. They have seasonal menus and their signature desserts that are available year-round. I got the Milky puff dessert. Unfortunately, they were out of condensed milk ice cream, so I got coconut sorbet instead, which went well with other components, too. It's a bit more expensive but on the other hand it is New York City and the dessert was definitely worth the price. Service was great, too

originalText.text: Spot Dessert Bar is a dessert lover’s paradise The desserts are unique, creative, and delicious, with a perfect balance of flavors and textures. I would highly recommend Spot Dessert Bar to anyone looking for a unique and memorable dessert experience in New York City.

originalText.text: Excellent place to go to for well crafted sweets which are delectably delicious! 5 stars way up the staff is very friendly as well! I recommend everything of their menu.
